Topic.Title: Please add format categories. Am I the only one?

Posts.EditableText: To the powers that be - please make a way to search games in format as well as genre. Some are a strange combo, but I don't think they'd be too hard to classify. I personally don't prefer any genre, I love any text adventure. I have to click through so many in any given category to find one that is actually that. So please, consider "Text Adventure" (parser) and "Storybook" (point and click)categories. Thanks! Has anyone else felt this way?
